# Unity generated folders
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/
[Uu]serSettings/

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# IDE folders
.vscode/
.idea/

# Auto-generated files
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.tmp
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd

# Crash reports
*.stacktrace

# Unity cache
[Aa]ssets/AssetStoreTools*

# Git LFS (optional for large assets)
*.psd
*.fbx
*.wav
*.mp4
*.mov
*.dll
